author: April Pierdant
title: Fallen power line sparks Tyler grassfire off county road
text:
TYLER, Texas (KLTV) - Sparks from a downed Tyler power line started a grass fire Wednesday.
Firefighters responded to the call on the 17000 block of County Road 4149 around 5 p.m.
A nearby resident said she saw the fire after returning home.
The fire has since been cleared and Oncor is working to restore the fallen line.
